title: Make all voter fields optional except Name and Voter ID in frontend

requirements.summary: Update VoterEntryForm to make all fields optional except Name and Voter ID while keeping all fields visible
acceptanceCriteria: The Name field displays required indicator and prevents submission when empty
The Voter ID field displays required indicator and prevents submission when empty
All other fields do not show required indicators
Form can be successfully submitted with only Name and Voter ID filled
All fields remain visible in the form layout
No console errors appear when submitting a form with minimal data

file_operations.description: Remove required validation from all form fields except Name and Voter ID. Update the register() calls for optional fields to remove the `required: true` validation rule. Ensure Name and Voter ID fields retain their required validation. Update field labels to remove required indicators (*) from optional fields. Verify that all fields remain visible in the form layout.

requirements.summary: Remove react-hook-form validation rules from optional fields in VoterEntryForm
acceptanceCriteria: The form's register() calls for optional fields do not include required validation rules
The name field retains its required validation rule
The voterId field retains its required validation rule
Form validation errors only appear for Name and Voter ID when they are empty
Users can skip any optional field without triggering validation errors

file_operations.description: Review all register() calls in the form and remove `required: true` from optional fields including: fatherHusbandName, address, gender, area, taluka, district, state, pincode, mobileNo, dob, caste, education, profession, office, politicalIdeology, comments, houseNumber, photo, signature, and educationalDocuments. Keep required validation only on name and voterId fields. Ensure form submission works with minimal data.

requirements.summary: Verify House Number field is optional and accepts text input
acceptanceCriteria: House Number field does not show a required indicator
Form submits successfully when House Number is left empty
House Number field accepts alphanumeric text input

file_operations.description: Verify that the House Number field does not have required validation, does not display a required indicator in its label, and accepts text input (not restricted to numbers only). Confirm the field can be left empty during form submission without triggering validation errors.
